com.payu.ratel.config.beans

Interface SelfAddressProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JbossPropertySelfAddressProvider, LocalhostSelfAddressProvider, RatelPropertySelfAddressProvider, SelfAddressProviderChain

    public interface SelfAddressProvider
    When service is registered it is crucial to be aware of address it is available at. Ratel already knows the context but still needs to be provided with a host:port pair. Ratel will try to guess application address based on most common configurations such as jboss.bind.address. The priority of sources that the address is taken from is defined in ServiceDiscoveryConfig.selfAddressProviders(org.springframework.core.env.Environment).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canProvide() 
      com.google.common.net.HostAndPort getHostAndPort() 

    • Method Detail

      • canProvide

        boolean canProvide()
        Returns:
        true if this provider can provide with a correct self address

      • getHostAndPort

        com.google.common.net.HostAndPort getHostAndPort()
        Returns:
        external address visible for other services in the network
